lines.content: This is a project template for a greenfield Java project. It's named after the Java mascot _Duke_. Given below are instructions on how to use it.
Prerequisites: JDK 11, update Intellij to the most recent version.
1. Open Intellij (if you are not in the welcome screen, click `File` > `Close Project` to close the existing project first)
1. Open the project into Intellij as follows:
1. Select the project directory, and click `OK`.
1. If there are any further prompts, accept the defaults.
1. Configure the project to use **JDK 11** (not other versions) as explained in [here](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/idea/sdk.html#set-up-jdk).
In the same dialog, set the **Project language level** field to the `SDK default` option.

3. After that, locate the `src/main/java/Duke.java` file, right-click it, and choose `Run Duke.main()` (if the code editor is showing compile errors, try restarting the IDE). If the setup is correct, you should see something like the below as the output:
4. Duke is released under an MIT license.
* This class contains the main method and it handles processes from start to end of the application.
* @param filePath Filepath for text file containing TaskList content
*                 which will be loaded into taskList variable in Duke class.
* Run the application by starting it and looping it until the exit command is given by user.
* @param launchArgs variable passed from the main method.
* Start the application by showing welcome message on UI.
* @param launchArgs variable passed from the main method.
* Loop the process of asking user for input, executing the user command
* and responding to user based on result of execution.
* Execute command provided and respond to user correctly based on the command executed.
* @param command Command provided by the user.
* End the application by showing goodbye message on UI and stop the program.
* Extended class of Command with methods involving addition of Task into TaskList.
* Returns Task after adding Task created based on userInput into the TaskList.
* @param userInput User Input obtain from UI.
* @param taskList TaskList which specified Task should be added to.
* @return Task as Task that has been added into TaskList.
public static Task addTodo (Parser userInput, TaskList taskList) throws DukeException{
* Returns Deadline after adding Deadline created based on userInput into the TaskList.
* @param userInput User Input obtain from UI.
* @param taskList TaskList which specified Task should be added to.
* @return Deadline as Task that has been added into TaskList.
public static Task addDeadline (Parser userInput, TaskList taskList) throws DukeException{
throw new DukeException("missing task & missing by");
* Returns Event after adding Event created based on userInput into the TaskList.
* @param userInput User Input obtain from UI.
* @param taskList TaskList which specified Task should be added to.
* @return Event as Task that has been added into TaskList.
public static Task addEvent (Parser userInput, TaskList taskList) throws DukeException {
throw new DukeException("missing task & missing at");
* This class will store the userInput provided by Parser class, taskList to be worked on, and targetIndex of specific task for operation (if applicable).
* Based on the stored information, specific operations will be executed based on command and variables provided in userInput on taskList with targetIndex,
* Information on executed actions (successful or unsuccessful) will be returned as ResultCommand.
* @param targetIndex index of Task which operation should be done on (in integer format).
* Update userInput and taskList with the specified variables.
* @param userInput User Input obtain from UI.
* @param taskList TaskList to do operation on.
public void setData(Parser userInput, TaskList taskList) {
* Return targetIndex variable stored in Command class
* Update targetIndex with the specified variables.
* @param targetIndex index of specific Task which should be operated on (in int format).
* Execute operation based on command and variables provided in userInput and return information on executed actions as ResultCommand.
* Command includes : todo, deadline, event, echo, bye, exit, hello, list, delete, mark, unmark, save.
* @return Information on executed actions (successful or unsuccessful) will be returned as ResultCommand.
public ResultCommand execute() throws DukeException, IOException {
* Extended class of Command with methods involving deletion of Task into TaskList.
* Removal of specified Task by index from TaskList.
* @param index index of Task, input obtained from UI (in String format), which to be removed from TaskList.
* @param taskList TaskList which specified Task to be deleted.
public static void deleteTask (String index, TaskList taskList) throws DukeException {
* Extended class of Command with methods involving listing of Task into TaskList.
* Listing Task in TaskList to UI.
* @param taskList TaskList to be displayed to UI.
public static void showList (TaskList taskList) throws DukeException {
* Extended class of Command with methods involving marking of Task into TaskList.
* Return the successfulness in change of status of Task
* If change is made, true is returned.
* Else change is not made, false is returned.
* @param index index of Task, input obtained from UI (in String format), which to be marked.
* @param taskList TaskList which specified Task to be marked.
* @return True or False based on successfulness in change of status of Task.
public static boolean markTask (String index, TaskList taskList) throws DukeException {
* This class will store and provide feedback based on executed actions.
* @param feedback Feedback based on executed actions.
* @param feedback Feedback based on executed actions.
* @param task Task which the executed action is based on.
* @param feedback Feedback based on executed actions.
* @param message Message which complements the feedback variables.
* Return feedback variable stored in ResultCommand class
* Return targetString variable stored in ResultCommand class
* Return targetItem variable stored in ResultCommand class
* Extended class of Command with methods involving un-marking of Task into TaskList.
* Return the successfulness in change of status of Task
* If change is made, true is returned.
* Else change is not made, false is returned.
* @param index index of Task, input obtained from UI (in String format), which to be marked.
* @param taskList TaskList which specified Task to be marked.
* @return True or False based on successfulness in change of status of Task.
public static boolean unmarkTask (String index, TaskList taskList) throws DukeException {
* This class will store information of error related to operations in Duke.
* @param error Specific error described in String format.
* Return error variable in DukeException class.
* This class will store the userInput that has been tokenized and contain methods for accessing the userInput value and size.
* This class also contain fileContentParser for conversion of text file content and removing the template.
* Returns List of String after converting text file content and removing template information.
* @param input File input from text file in String.
* @return a list of Strings on text file content.
// capture current word separated by space character
* Returns userInput variable in Parser class at specific index.
* @param index index of userInput to be accessed.
* @return the Strings at specific index of userInput.
* Returns size of userInput variable in Parser class.
* Returns LocalDateTime based on userInput variable in Parser class.
* @param index the starting index of userInput which contain information of dateTime.
public static LocalDateTime dateTimeParser(int index) throws DukeException {
* Extended class of Parser with method that converts user input from String into an ArrayList.
* Returns user input in ArrayList format after separating each individual word in String.
* @param input User Input obtain from UI.
* @return ArrayList containing individual words from user input.
// capture current word separated by space character
* This class will store filePath of a text file used for storage of TaskList
* and provide methods to create, read and modify the text file.
* Return filepath variable in Storage class.
* Create new text file with template at filepath.
* @param taskList TaskList which Task content to be saved in text file.
public void create(TaskList taskList) throws IOException {
* Return TaskList with the Task information saved in the text file in filepath.
public ArrayList<Task> load() throws DukeException, IOException {
* Saves and updates text file in the filepath with the content of TaskList provided.
* @param taskList TaskList which Task content to be saved in text file.
public void save(TaskList taskList) throws IOException, DukeException {
* Returns the entire content of text file in a single line String format.
* @return content of text file in String format.
* This class is an extension of Task class with the addition of "by" variable and also contains methods to access and modify variable.
* @param by deadline of Task in LocalDateTime format.
* @return deadline of Task in String format.
* Update deadline of Task with duration provided.
* @param by deadline of Task to update as.
* This class is an extension of Task class with the addition of "at" variable and also contains methods to access and modify variable.
* @param at duration of Event in LocalDateTime format.
* @return duration of Event in String format.
* Update duration of Event with duration provided.
* @param at duration of Event to update as.
* This class stores description and status of a Task and contains methods to access and modify them.
* Change the task status to status provided.
* Returns true if change can be done to task status,
* and returns false if change cannot be done to task status.
* @param isDone status to be changed to.
* @return if there is any change in status of Task.
* This class stores List of Task and contains methods to access and modify them.
* Return taskList variable in TaskList class.
* @return taskList variable as List of Task.
* Return specific Task in taskList with index provided.
* @param index index of task to be accessed.
* Remove specific Task in taskList with index provided.
* @param index index of task to be removed.
* @param task Task to be added into taskList.
* This class handles UI interaction between Haro and User by capturing user input and generate reply message then output it to user.
* It also stores the user's name requested at the start of every session.
* Constructor for Ui and set userName as unknown.
System.out.println("\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t Haro ! How may I address you ? Haro !");
System.out.println("\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t Haro ! " + userName + ", How may Haro help you today ? Haro ");
* Show error message generated on UI based on DukeException provided.
* @param e DukeException error with details on type of error
* Show io error message generated on UI.
* Echo String variable provided with generated message on UI.
* Output generated response message to user on UI based on details on ResultCommand.
* @param result ResultCommand with information of executed action.
* Output taskList on UI based on TaskList provided.
* @param taskList TaskList to be outputted onto UI.
System.out.println("\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t Haro ! You now have " + taskList.size() + " tasks in the list ! Haro !");
* Return user input as String after obtaining it from UI.
* Return generated message based on command and placeholder variable provided.
* Some command has multiple possible response and the decision on which message to return is determined by a random number generator.
* @return message generated based on command and placeholder variable as String.
public static String generateMessage(String command, String placeholder) {
